links.*: The Lord of the Rings (film series)

wikitext.*:
'''The Friendship Onion''' is a podcast hosted by actors [[Dominic Monaghan]] and [[Billy Boyd]]. It was launched in 2021 by Kast Media. In the podcast, Monaghan and Boyd share stories about their time filming ''[[The Lord of the Rings (film series)]]'', interview members of the cast and crew, and answer questions from fans.<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=https://kastmedia.com/podcasts/friendship-onion/|articlename=Friendship Onion|dated=|website=[https://kastmedia.com/ Kast Media]|accessed=14 January 2023}}</ref>

Notable guests who have appeared on the podcast include [[Elijah Wood]], [[Richard Taylor]], [[Stephen Colbert]], [[Sean Astin]], [[Corey Olsen]], [[Mark Ordesky]], and [[Bear McCreary]].
